definition: my old mother/I, this old woman/my old lady (colloquial)/maternal grandmother/midwife

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Drop your pants, maybe I'll remember.
sentences.chinese: 把裤子脱了，可能老娘有印象。

sentences.english: I love you so much. I just don't like you anymore.
sentences.chinese: 老娘曾经爱过你个人渣，现在只是不想再傻逼了。

sentences.english: She has even bought me a " Pervert Alarm".
sentences.chinese: 不过她有老娘买给她的防变态报警器挖哈哈。

sentences.english: In fact, I respect you so much, I treat you as my mom.
sentences.chinese: 其实我对你就像对我自己老娘一样的尊重。

sentences.english: The thief intimidated my old lady into not telling the police.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼威胁我老娘不得向警方报告。

sentences.english: Your mother made you peel water chestnuts and snow peas.
sentences.chinese: 你老娘喜欢给你准备剥好的菱角和雪豆。

sentences.english: I escaped a knew you were a monster.
sentences.chinese: 老娘法眼一开就知道你是个妖孽了。

sentences.english: I only told him that showering once a month was not normal.
sentences.chinese: 老娘只是跟他说一个月洗一次澡有点不太好而已啊喂。

sentences.english: Hogan opened his aging mother know you are an evildoer.
sentences.chinese: 老娘法眼一开就知道你是个妖孽了。

sentences.english: King division north entrance injection blood, will entrust in the old niang hometown blade.
sentences.chinese: 王师北口喷鲜血，将家乡的老娘托付于刀锋。

sentences.english: Who dares disturb me while I ponder! ?
sentences.chinese: 有谁敢在老娘思考问题的时候打扰？

definition: see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
father/daddy/"I, your father" (in anger, or out of contempt)/I (used arrogantly or jocularly)
euphemistic equivalent of 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
devil/You devil! (as joke or insult)/the departed
